segments.text: What's your favorite kind of music ? Do you like pop music ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like almost all kinds of music . But I like country music best .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There was a concert country music last week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wish I had been there !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like it , too . But sometimes I enjoy jazz and classical music .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have good taste in music .
segments.speaker: S2
